pages.name: Registration
userStoryIndex: As a new user, I want to register for an account to access the platform.

pages.name: Login
userStoryIndex: As a user, I want to log in to my account to access my personalized features.

pages.name: Product Browsing
userStoryIndex: As a user, I want to browse available products to find items that interest me.

pages.name: Product Details
userStoryIndex: As a user, I want to view detailed information about a product to decide if I want to purchase it.

pages.name: Cart Management
userStoryIndex: As a user, I want to manage my shopping cart by adding or removing products.

pages.name: Order Processing
userStoryIndex: As a user, I want to complete my purchase by placing an order.

pages.name: User Profile
userStoryIndex: As a user, I want to manage my profile information to keep it up to date.

pages.name: Company Listings
userStoryIndex: As a user, I want to view a list of agricultural companies to find local suppliers.

pages.name: Analytics Dashboard (Admin)
userStoryIndex: As an admin, I want to analyze user data to improve the platform's performance and user experience.
